entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 40%
